title: Vision of The Moons
description: Madi Baranova, a vampire, has dreamed of her transition into an adult ever since she heard the supernatural body transforms itself into its optimal state around the twenty-fifth birthday. A week past her twenty-fifth birthday, she hoped the numbers on the scale would surprise her, but instead Gavin Zelko surprised her by looking at her as if she were already the beautiful woman she longed to be.Don't miss the first installment in Vision of the Moons!
author: Jynnipher Olbert
